title: Building trust and increasing inclusion in public health research: co-produced strategies for engaging UK ethnic minority communities in research
content:
Publication date: August 2024

Source: Public Health, Volume 233

Author(s): O. Gafari, M. Bahrami-Hessari, J. Norton, R. Parmar, M. Hudson, L. Ndegwa, S. Agyapong-Badu, K.P. Asante, N.A. Alwan, S. McDonough, M.A. Tully, P.C. Calder, M. Barker, M. Stokes
